description: This file defines a script that creates an agent with a MistralChat model, fetches an image from a URL, and uses the agent to print a response about the image, including the image content.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with models and handles responses.

classes.name: Image
classes.description: Represents an image object used in responses.

classes.name: MistralChat
classes.description: A model class for the Mistral chat model used by the agent.

methods.name: fetch_image_bytes
methods.description: Fetches image bytes from a given URL using HTTP GET with specific headers.
